section.p: Measurement of carbon monoxide in patient's bloodstream

ol.li:
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( CONF:11557 ) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.10.1.167"
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:11305)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:10297)/@code="20563-3" Carboxyhemoglobin/?Hemoglobin.total in Blood (CodeSystem: ) (CONF:10296)

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] effectiveTime (CONF:11306)
NEMSIS Trace: EVitals.01

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with @xsi:type="PQ" (CONF:10298)
NEMSIS Trace: EVitals.17 UCUM units will typically be "%".
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:11305)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:10297)/@code="20563-3" Carboxyhemoglobin/?Hemoglobin.total in Blood (CodeSystem: ) (CONF:10296)

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] effectiveTime (CONF:11306)
NEMSIS Trace: EVitals.01

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with @xsi:type="PQ" (CONF:10298)
NEMSIS Trace: EVitals.17 UCUM units will typically be "%".

body.codeblock: <observation classCode="SPCOBS" moodCode="EVN"> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.10.1.167"/> <code code="20563-3" displayName="Carboxyhemoglobin/?Hemoglobin.total in Blood"/> <value xsi:type="PQ"/> </observation>
